00070 typedef enum {
00071     SCULPT_UNDO_COORDS,
00072     SCULPT_UNDO_HIDDEN
00073 } SculptUndoType;
00074 
00075 typedef struct SculptUndoNode {
00076     struct SculptUndoNode *next, *prev;
00077 
00078     SculptUndoType type;
00079 
00080     char idname[MAX_ID_NAME];   /* name instead of pointer*/
00081     void *node;                 /* only during push, not valid afterwards! */
00082 
00083     float (*co)[3];
00084     float (*orig_co)[3];
00085     short (*no)[3];
00086     int totvert;
00087 
00088     /* non-multires */
00089     int maxvert;                /* to verify if totvert it still the same */
00090     int *index;                 /* to restore into right location */
00091     BLI_bitmap vert_hidden;
00092 
00093     /* multires */
00094     int maxgrid;                /* same for grid */
00095     int gridsize;               /* same for grid */
00096     int totgrid;                /* to restore into right location */
00097     int *grids;                 /* to restore into right location */
00098     BLI_bitmap *grid_hidden;
00099 
00100     /* layer brush */
00101     float *layer_disp;
00102 
00103     /* shape keys */
00104     char shapeName[sizeof(((KeyBlock *)0))->name];
00105 } SculptUndoNode;
